video.title: Bleach
video.synopsis: After teenager Ichigo Kurosaki acquires superpowers from wounded soul reaper Rukia Kuchiki, the two of them join forces to round up lost souls.

episodes.synopsis: Teenage Ichigo Kurosaki's ability to see ghosts seems mundane after Soul Reaper Rukia Kuchiki enters his life. She helps lost souls find peace, and when she transfers some of her powers to Ichigo so he can save his family, he becomes a Soul Reaper.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo runs into Rukia at school, where she's posing as a transfer student. She wants him to take over her Soul Reaper duties, but Ichigo turns her down just as a mysterious shadow begins to follow Orihime Inoue, a cheerful classmate with a sad past.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Some souls don't pass peacefully to the Soul Society but instead linger and become Hollows who seek those they loved most in life. For Orihime, this means that her brother, who's become a Hollow, wants her soul for himself.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo's pal and classmate Chad Sado brings a cursed bird to school that's really the soul of a boy who lived a tragic life. Rukia wants to help the troubled soul pass on, but she and Ichigo will first have to fight the Hollow who's hunting the boy.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Rukia and Chad take on Shrieker, a vicious Hollow who's beaten many Soul Reapers and committed many crimes. But with Rukia's diminished powers and Chad's inability to see Hollows, they don't stand much of a chance without Ichigo.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: At a Soul Reaper supply shop, Rukia picks up a modified soul to take over Ichigo's body while he's pulling Soul Reaper duty. But the modified soul soon absconds with Ichigo's body, determined to have some fun.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Rukia and Ichigo track his body to an elementary school. While Ichigo struggles with the mischievous soul inhabiting his body, Rukia hears about a Hollow sighting nearby but can't confirm the location.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On the anniversary of his mother's death, Ichigo intends to take the day off from Soul Reaper duties to visit her grave with the rest of his family. But Rukia is at the cemetery waiting for him.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo faces the Grand Fisher, a Hollow who uses a lure in the shape of a little girl -- and Ichigo remembers her as the same girl he saw when his mother died. As he attacks the Hollow in a rage, Rukia attempts to rescue him.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: When TV hero Don Kanonji schedules a taping of his show "Spirit Hunter" at an abandoned hospital, Ichigo is surprised to find a demi-Hollow being summoned for the program. But he soon realizes Kanonji's methods are risky and steps in to save the day.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Rumors spread about Ichigo and Rukia's relationship when they keep disappearing from school to respond to Hollow alerts. Meanwhile, the overworked Ichigo is unaware that one of his classmates has his own spiritual power -- and he hates Soul Reapers!
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: To prove how useless Soul Reapers are, Uryu releases bait to lure Hollows to town and soon they're everywhere -- including one that's threatening Chad and Ichigo's sister.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When a Hollow pays Orihime a visit at school, she discovers her spiritual powers as she tries to defend her classmates -- whom the Hollow has turned against her.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of their battle, Ichigo learns that Uryu's a Quincy, beings who have a long-standing rivalry with Soul Reapers. But with the Hollow attacks increasing and the appearance of the giant Menos Grande, the two must team up to save their town.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Rukia fears that news of Ichigo's battle with Menos Grande will attract the Soul Society's attention. Meanwhile, amid the activities of everyday school life, she and Uryu find themselves feeling increasingly out of place.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: While wandering the streets, Rukia runs into two reapers from the Soul Society: her brother Byakuya and Renji Abarai, who censure her for giving her powers to a human. Stumped by Rukia's unexplained exit, Ichigo morphs into a Soul Reaper to find her.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo squares off against Renji Abarai, but when it looks as if Ichigo may win, Byakuya Kuchiki steps in and deals him a fierce blow from his zanpakuto. With Ichigo down and out, Rukia agrees to return to the Soul Society.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation begins, but it's all work for Ichigo, who starts training with Urahara Kisuke to enter the Soul Society and save Rukia. Meanwhile, under Yoruichi's guidance, Chad and Orihime learn to use their awakening powers.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: In the Soul Society, Rukia learns that she'll be taken to the Central Execution Grounds in 25 days to face her punishment. Meanwhile, Chad and Orihime strive to control their powers, and Ichigo struggles to bounce back from a near-death experience.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo completes the third lesson of Urahara's training and learns his zanpakuto's name. After a rest, he reports to Urahara's shop for a meeting and discovers that Chad, Orihime and Uryu have also been training for the journey to the Soul Society.
episodes.title: The Substitute: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and the others make it through to the Soul Society.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and crew defeat the giant, but their entrance into the Seireitei is far from smooth sailing.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: An arrogant, boar-riding bully named Ganju Shiba challenges Ichigo and his friends to a fight.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Kukaku Shiba agrees to catapult Ichigo and the others over the walls of the Seireitei with her own creation: the Flower Crane Cannon.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Chad, Uryu and Orihime concentrate on controlling their spirit energies for their flight into the Seireitei.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: During their flight into the Seireitei, Ichigo and the others get separated.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Within the Seireitei, a full-fledged search for the intruders is put into action. Meanwhile, Rukia is transferred to the Repentance Cell to await her execution.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and his fellow ryoka are forced to stay alert and on their toes as they continue to be hunted by Soul Reapers.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: News of the intruders' surprising strength spreads among the Soul Reapers, and the captains are eager for information.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Hanataro Yamada leads Ichigo and Ganju toward the Repentance Cell where Rukia is being held.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Renji and Ichigo engage in battle.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Renji faces defeat, and in his final moments recalls his childhood with Rukia in the Rukongai district of the Soul Society.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: In the world of the living, television personality Don Kanonji recruits Ichigo's sisters, Karin and Yuzu, to learn how to fight bad spirits.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Word of Renji's defeat spreads, and all-out war is declared against the ryoka.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: When a prominent captain of the Soul Reapers is found dead, they turn against one another amid a flurry of suspicion and accusations.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Ganju and Hanataro climb the Senzaikyu's great staircase -- the White Tower -- only to sense an unprecedented amount of spirit energy.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Chad's journey to the Senzaikyu is interrupted by the captain of Squad 8.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, still battling Capt. Zaraki, senses a loss of Chad's spirit energy and fears the worst.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: As he lies weak on the ground with sword wounds, Ichigo is greeted by a vision of an embodied version of his zanpakuto.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Ganju and Hanataro continue toward the Senzaikyu to save Rukia.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Sensing great spirit energy near the Repentance Cell, Ichigo defies Yoruichi's orders and flees to help Ganju and Hanataro.
episodes.title: The Entry: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: To get to Rukia, Orihime and Uryu disguise themselves as Soul Reapers.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: While dressed as Soul Reapers, Orihime and Uryu are offered help by Squad 12 -- but Uryu quickly realizes that the jig is up and the offer is a trap.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: The captain decides it would be better to capture Uryu and study his distinctive abilities rather than kill him.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Yoruichi trains Ichigo in the finer points of using his zanpakuto.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Momo Hinamori recalls her days at the Soul Reaper Academy, where she trained in the world of the living.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Momo, Renji and Izuru all escape.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: In her holding cell, Rukia has a dream that she believes will help her prepare for the next day's events.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: In her dream, Rukia recalls the time she spent training under Lt. Kaien Shiba and Capt. Jushiro Ukitake.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: In the world of the living, Don Kanonji tries to boost his television show's ratings by recruiting Kon as the program's mascot.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Preparations get under way for Rukia's execution.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: While Ichigo continues his bankai training, Renji tries to save Rukia.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: As Rukia is being led to her execution, the ever-devious Gin Ichimaru stops her. Rukia has prepared herself for death, but her resolve is broken by Gin's offer to let her live.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Rukia stands on the Sokyoku on the brink of execution, not knowing that help is on the way.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: While Renji hurries to get Rukia out of harm's way, Ichigo stays behind to hold off Byakuya.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Ukitake and Capt. Kyoraku face the punishment meted out by Capt. Yamamoto's zanpakuto.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Fueled by anger and feelings of abandonment and betrayal, Soi Fon persists in her attempt to destroy her former master, Yoruichi -- but her cocksure attitude may hamper her abilities.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: The fierce battle between Byakuya and Ichigo rages on as he taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his bankai against him.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Though the power exerted by Ichigo may have impressed Byakuya, he's not done fighting yet.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: After breaking into the chambers of Central 46 -- the highest judicial body in the Soul Society -- Capt. Hitsugaya and Matsumoto discover that the forty Sages and six Judges were slaughtered days earlier.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: After defeating Hitsugaya, Capt. Aizen heads for the Execution Grounds. Renji is dumbfounded as he finds himself facing Aizen, Ichimaru and Tosen at Sokyoku Hill.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Furious after hearing news of the defection of three captains, Sajin Komamura arrives at Sokyoku ready to beat the treachery out of Aizen and his lackeys.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: As peace returns, Capt. Komamura and Lt. Hisagi visit the graves of fallen comrades, and the Soul Society recuperates from the deep wounds left by the treachery of Capt. Aizen and his partners in crime.
episodes.title: The Rescue: Episode 63
